extendedInfo.description: Grab junk cars with the claw truck for demolition, smash buildings with a wrecking ball, use your crane to build steel truss structures, use a forklift to load a trash compactor, and maneuver your monster construction excavator to load and unload big rigs.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good game wish machines controls were better but not bad great for passing time
reviews.author: Johnny Marler

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Realistic, challenging controls. Those excellent graphics require a top of the line phone, so keep that in mind. A lot of fun!
reviews.author: Zeph Dulin

reviews.title: Needs work!!!!
reviews.comment: The controls should have a null zone. They simulates real controls but its harder than controlling the real thing because of no null zone. There should also be more missions or things to do. I cannot even scoop sand with the excavator.
reviews.author: ahmad alnajjar

reviews.title: Need major improvement
reviews.comment: OK so it is what it is for a dollar. However it would be nice to see more machines and levels and even a free play mode where u could build and dig what ever u wanted. Please expand this game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wow no wonder they don\'t have a free one Sux......not happy at allowing\tGames way to slow needs update bad can\'t see what I\'m doing thought it would be different no wonder there\'s no free demo they wanna take ur money an not respond wtf give us our money back this games would be better if u could update it an change the ways u can see what ur doing.....thanks
reviews.author: robert derringer

reviews.title: John
reviews.comment: This game has potential to be real fun if all the bugs were fixed, sound, controls, collecting the excavated ground in the shovel,  and much more, really hope you manage to fix these problems,  when I had an I phoDeeBuGG ne there was a similar game on there which worked great and all vehicles were at your disposal in the environment at the same time,  you just had to touch which one to drive, and the controls were great. This however needs work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Extrem construction
reviews.comment: Well it needs alot of work the controls are way to close to the fwd an revs pedals . An the controls are way to small . Giving it two for good effort. And i see all this other equipment i can\'t drive on the main screen that\'s a tease lol since i use a loader in a quarry . But the controls are rite for what piece on the machine like the excavator that\'s cool but all the same need bigger controls lol please improve make it a lil more worth the 2 bucks . Thanks guys
reviews.author: vincent newton

reviews.title: So so
reviews.comment: Some upgrades would be nice like some different excavator levels I am an operator my self and I can see the potential in the app
reviews.author: Matthew Oberg

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: This doesn\'t work for me. I have uninstaled and reinstaled and still doesnt work it just crashes I would like a refund
reviews.author: Joel Pesl

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: This is an awesome game with the controls like a real truck. It just needs an update to improve the game play.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: More improvement please
reviews.comment: This could be a very good game. I\'d love to see updates. Its like an unfinished game which needs a lot of improvement. I hope the maker of this game  will make changes. And also if we could pick up the dirt instead of the rocks. And more sound effects. There\'s more things to say but it won\'t end so I\'ll stop here
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t do it
reviews.comment: It\'s cool but it\'s laggy on every device I tried. And the controls are terrible, maybe with an update
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Slow, cumbersome. Rubbish.
reviews.comment: I want a refund. Now. Game is buggy, slow, cumbersome, lacks intuitiveness, had awful graphics and input systems and no sound as far as I can work out.  Only plus for me is a large-ish selection of trucks.  Asus Tf101
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: The game is extremely slow, unresponsive and the controls are horrible. With a better set of controls this app would be great.
reviews.author: Nicholas Harman

reviews.title: Very poor
reviews.comment: Not worth the money doesnt let u do half the things and hard to use
reviews.author: Ross Cunningham

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: This game is a bad game its slow my phone has turned it self off 2 time I would like a refund please
reviews.author: bobby mactavish

reviews.title: Getting thier
reviews.comment: Wow this is becoming a true SIM graphics nice, content plenty for now and gameply is fun but its problems are in the many I loved it but just needs the controls tweaked up and the drive for the digger is backwards (i have operated the real thing) tht just needs to become moving sticks tht stop as soon as u let go like it should and yes control levers are a pain but pleeeaaaseee we beg u to get then perfect and add controler support would be an amazing touch my nefews will love it once finish great work
reviews.author: Ryan Ariti

reviews.title: Terrible piece of crashing sh\302\241t!
reviews.comment: The app crashed my device not just the app. The screen went into multi lined static along with a static sound.  Terrible app. Had to restart happened twice before I uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucked
reviews.comment: This suck needs to be updated runs way to slow worst thing I ever bought
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s2x 2.3.5
reviews.comment: Seems ok so far. Pretty fun, I feel like a kid again with my Tonka trucks :p  Not one update or anything? No response to any comments...glad it was only a buck. There are some pretty good suggestions for things to add but clearly they fall on deaf ears. Too bad cause it had potential. Dropping to 3 stars until something new comes along.
reviews.author: A Google User
